title: Electron moves across shaded region magnetic field

content.question: An electron is moving to the right, as shown in the figure above. It passes through the shaded region, which contains a magnetic field. The electron travels along a path that takes it through point P. The gravitational force on the electron is negligible. What is the direction of the magnetic field?

choices.label: Toward the top of the page
Toward the bottom of the page

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
